statements: SELECT * FROM StudentGrades WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade > 90;
SELECT course_name, grade FROM StudentGrades WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM StudentGrades WHERE student_id = 2 AND grade < 70;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade FROM StudentGrades WHERE course_id IN (101, 102) ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade > 90 ORDER BY grade DESC, student_name ASC
SELECT * FROM StudentGrades WHERE course_id = 101 AND grade >= 80 ORDER BY student_id
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM StudentGrades WHERE student_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY course_name
SELECT course_id, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM StudentGrades GROUP BY course_id HAVING AVG(grade) > 75 ORDER BY average_grade DESC
SELECT * FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade BETWEEN 70 AND 75 ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT * FROM student_grades;
SELECT student_id, grade, subject FROM student_grades WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT subject, student_id, grade FROM student_grades WHERE subject = 'Math';
SELECT student_id, grade, subject FROM student_grades ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_id, grade, subject FROM student_grades WHERE grade < 60 ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_grades WHERE subject='Mathematics';
SELECT student_id, grade FROM student_grades WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT subject, COUNT(student_id) AS student_count FROM student_grades GROUP BY subject HAVING COUNT(student_id) > 5;
SELECT student_id, grade, performance_score FROM student_grades JOIN performance_data ON student_grades.student_id = performance_data.student_id WHERE grade < 70 ORDER BY performance_score ASC;
SELECT student_id, grade, attendance FROM student_grades LEFT JOIN performance_data ON student_grades.student_id = performance_data.student_id WHERE attendance IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM StudentGrades;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM StudentGrades WHERE semester='Spring';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM CourseInfo ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(final_score) AS highest_score FROM StudentPerformance;
SELECT student_id, AVG(quiz_score) AS avg_quiz_score FROM StudentPerformance GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade, semester FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade >= 80 ORDER BY semester DESC
SELECT course_name, instructor, course_id FROM CourseInfo WHERE instructor IS NOT NULL ORDER BY course_name
SELECT student_id, SUM(quiz_score) AS total_quiz_score, AVG(final_score) AS avg_final_score FROM StudentPerformance GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(student_id) > 1
SELECT course_name, SUM(grade) AS total_grade FROM StudentGrades AS sg JOIN CourseInfo AS ci ON sg.course_id = ci.course_id GROUP BY course_name ORDER BY total_grade DESC
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade, semester FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade < 60 OR semester LIKE 'Fall%' ORDER BY student_id, semester DESC
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credit_hours FROM Courses;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM Grades;
SELECT student_id, overall_performance, attendance_percentage FROM Performance;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 80;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Courses.course_id = Grades.course_id;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credit_hours FROM Courses WHERE credit_hours >= 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, overall_performance, attendance_percentage FROM Students JOIN Performance ON Students.student_id = Performance.student_id WHERE overall_performance = 'Excellent';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT course_name, course_description, course_credit FROM courses WHERE course_credit >= 3;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM students ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT exam_id, exam_type, course_id, exam_date FROM exams WHERE exam_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, grade_level FROM students ORDER BY grade_level DESC
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM courses WHERE course_credit > 3
SELECT student_id, grade FROM grades WHERE grade >= 80
SELECT exam_id, exam_date, exam_type FROM exams ORDER BY exam_date ASC
SELECT student_id, course_id, attendance_date FROM attendance WHERE is_present = true
